map.location: Move the map to your location

modal.completedService: To complete the service, please input the following details:
modal.dispatchResources: Dispatch the resources for the scheduled service on {date}:
modal.cancelService: Cancel the scheduled service on {date}. Please provide a reason for the cancellation:
modal.reportIssue: Report an issue with the service on {date}. Please include the reason in your report:

form.noAddressFound: No address found! The postal code may be incorrect. Please enter the address manually.

serviceTypeDesc.singleService: A one-off service that will occur once on the specified date.
serviceTypeDesc.regularService: A service that will occur regularly based on the schedule within the specified period.
serviceTypeDesc.alternateService: A service that will occur on every alternate day within the specified period.

messages.noMatchingFeature: No matching feature found! Please refine your search parameters.
messages.matchingFeatures: Found matching features! Updating the visualisation...
messages.timeSearchMessage: No matching feature found! Attempting to display all features within the selected time period...
messages.selectFeatureFromMap: Select a feature on the map to explore its information in detail.
messages.multipleFeatures: Multiple overlapping features detected within the clicked area. Please select a specific feature for more detailed information.
